content: *skip 3 sts double_crochet picot chain 1 double_crochet picot chain 1 double_crochet picot chain 1 double_crochet skip 3 sts single_crochet repeat from * ending with single_crochet in last st 2 more single_crochet in last st to work around corner slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet from other side fasten_off 13 14 15 16 pattern repeats belt tie using 4 5 mm hook work romanian cord for approximately 12 or desired length fasten_off leaving 8-10 /20-25 cm tail to attach tie repeat for 2nd tie attach ties to each end of belt weave in ends check out the other cozy coils patterns on our other sites www cozycoils com etsy ravelry facebook keep cozy while coiling this pattern is for personal use finished products of this pattern may by sold please credit cozy coils crocheting for the design the photographs and pattern contained herein are copyright of cozy coils crocheting no unauthorized use in whole or part is permitted cozycoils@outlook com
